attributes.action: Make southend lane (A2218) safer for children to cross
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In feb 2008 a 6 year old child was killed by a motorbike on the way to school.  The child suffered massive head injuries, which the doctor said, "were so servere they hadn't seen anything like it before". the child later died in Great Ormond Street Hospital.  There are five schools along Southend Lane and there have been many serious incidents along this road.  Please sign for traffic calming measures such as: speed bumps/cameras, lolly pop crossing, zebra or pelican crossing.
